interface.name: plugin_manager_v1
interface.description: This interface allows a client to get server(dock) some info and create plugins to compositor.

event.name: event_message
event.description: This event will emitted when server(dock) send message to plugin. Such as dock position/themeType/overflowStatus and other event defined in server(dock) interface

request.name: request_message
request.description: This event will emitted when client send message to server. Such as plugin status interface defined.

request.name: create_popup_at
request.description: This will created a popup window at (x, y) pos relative to ouput.
